meanings.definition: In a bad-tempered or irritable mood.
meanings.sent1: She was the grouchiest person in the office, always frowning and snapping at everyone.
meanings.sent2: The old man on the corner looked grouchiest when it started to rain.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed grouchiest today, hissing at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered overhead, casting a grouchiest shadow over the town.
meanings.sent5: His grouchiest expression could scare away even the bravest souls.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to complain or grumble.
meanings.sent1: The grouchiest customer at the store demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent2: She became grouchiest when her favorite show was interrupted by a news bulletin.
meanings.sent3: The grouchiest squirrel in the park chattered loudly at anyone who passed by.
meanings.sent4: His car was the grouchiest vehicle on the road, always making strange noises.
meanings.sent5: The grouchiest neighbor on the block was known for leaving passive-aggressive notes.
